member.name: T:Kyse.AspNetCore.StaticLibrary.RangeHelper
member.summary: Provides a parser for the Range Header in an .

member.name: M:Kyse.AspNetCore.StaticLibrary.RangeHelper.ParseRange(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Headers.RequestHeaders,System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns the normalized form of the requested range if the Range Header in the is valid.
member.param: The total length of the file representation requested.
member.returns: A boolean value which represents if the contain a single valid range request. A which represents the normalized form of the range parsed from the or null if it cannot be normalized.
member.remark: If the Range header exists but cannot be parsed correctly, or if the provided length is 0, then the range request cannot be satisfied (status 416). This results in (true,null) return values.
